title: Remote Desktop
description: Control another computer remotely, as if you were sitting right in front of it.
info: This feature allows you to take full control of a remote desktop, enabling you to work on applications, access files, and perform tasks on another computer.

title: Deployfy : Frontend Deployment
description: Deploy Your Frontend Project easily in Minutes with Deployfy.
info: Deployfy simplifies the deployment process, allowing developers to push their frontend projects live with just a few clicks.

title: File Sharing
description: Securely Share files easily and quickly between connected users.
info: This feature allows users to send and receive files without storing them permanently on the remote system, perfect for quick transfers.

title: Private Coding Environment
description: Your personal sanctuary for coding and development.
info: A secure, isolated environment for your coding needs with full IDE capabilities, ensuring privacy and focus.

title: Collaborative Coding
description: Code together in real-time with audio-video support.
info: This feature provides a full-featured collaborative environment with code execution, canvas, chat, and video calls.

title: Meeting Handler
info: Comprehensive meeting management with scheduling and participation features to enhance productivity.

title: Live Streaming Service
description: Broadcast your screen or video feed to a wide audience in real-time.
info: This feature allows users to share their screen or video with an audience, making it ideal for presentations and tutorials.

title: Virtual Whiteboard
description: Collaborate visually with an interactive whiteboard.
info: Real-time collaborative drawing and diagramming tool for brainstorming sessions and visual presentations.

title: TextPad
description: Simple yet powerful text editing tool.
info: A feature-rich text editor for all your writing needs, offering syntax highlighting and various formatting options.
